channel.title: Kubernetes on keptn
channel.description: Recent content in Kubernetes on keptn

item.title: Install keptn v.0.1 on GKE
item.description: To install and configure keptn in a Kubernetes cluster, follow these instructions: Step 1: Prerequisites The next steps expect that you have a working Kubernetes cluster in Google Container Engine (GKE). See the Getting Started Guides for details about creating a cluster with the folllowing configuration: Master version 1.11.6 (minimum tested master version 1.10.11) Node pool with 2 nodes: each 8vCPUs and 30 GB memory (n1-standard-8 in GKE) image type: Ubuntu (preferred) or Container-Optimized OS (cos)
